author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Neither, I was genesis syncing to head, then shut down my node for a couple of days and the restarted. During the catch up the node took ~3 minutes to sync 4 minutes worth of blocks

author: jimmygchen
content: I'm syncing lh/geth now, and it does seem really slow, has anyone else experienced this on a different pair?

author: jimmygchen
content: ah you were saying it's slow near the head - just had 14 mins worth of blocks (and 38 blobs) synced in 12 secs, doesn't seem super slow, maybe there were more blobs?

author: parithosh
content: we should be roughly as full as when marius was syncing tbh, almost every slot has blobs in them

author: terence0083
content: does anyone know how I can send an invalid blob? and also a valid one? what tool is yall using?

author: barnabasbusa
content: invalid blob would be invalidated imo

author: barnabasbusa
content: you would probably need a client that accepts it

author: barnabasbusa
content: This is how we send blobs, thanks to <@277500722655002624>'s tool: https://github.com/ethpandaops/4844-testnet/blob/master/scripts/run.zsh#L264

author: parithosh
content: I think if you wanna submit invalid ones, marius's tx-fuzz is probably your best bet: https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/tx-fuzz/pull/8

author: terence0083
content: thanks guys, will try sending good ones first
